rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PSC1021, PSC1022}
(Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469, 4637, E3008, P2001, P3002})

description: An introduction to the major techniques which underpin the practical aspects of compound identification for medicinal chemistry: UV spectroscopy, IR spectroscopy, Mass spectroscopy and NMR spectroscopy.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
